1.16.5.1.0.1-1.16.5:
09/19/2022

• Increased the default librarian villager trade level to 3 (journeyman).
• Added configuration options for villager and wandering trader trades.
1.16.5.1.0.2-1.16.5:
09/22/2022

• Modified the way vanilla only enchantments are determined.
• Tweaked the enchanted book glue texture.
1.16.5.1.0.3-1.16.5:
10/01/2022

• Using an enchanted book in the recipe will now add more enchantments to that book (up to 5).

1.17.1.1.0.1-1.17.1:
09/19/2022

• Lowered the default number of trades that can be performed when purchasing ancient manuscripts from villagers or traders.
• Added configuration options for villager and wandering trader trades.
1.17.1.1.0.2-1.17.1:
09/22/2022

• Fixed a server side bug that would not let players join a multiplayer world. Sorry about that!
• Modified the way vanilla only enchantments are determined.
• Tweaked the enchanted book glue texture.

10/01/2022

• Using an enchanted book in the recipe will now add more enchantments to that book (up to 5).
